snippet.title: GOD WARS Future Past - Debut Trailer (PS4, PS Vita)
snippet.description:
Website: http://godwarsgame.com/
Check out the Limited Edition at http://store.nisamerica.com/god-wars-future-past-limited-edition

Discover Japan's untold stories in GOD WARS Future Past. Learn more and pre-order the game at http://godwarsgame.com/

GOD WARS Future Past is a tactical RPG that fuses stories from the oldest record of Japan's history, the Kojiki book, with traditional Japanese tales. Explore the lives of heroes who made their mark by fighting against the fate set out before them.
